statements: UPDATE proteomics_data SET spectral_count = 100 WHERE experiment_id = 1 AND protein_id = 10;
UPDATE proteomics_data SET peptide_evidence = 'Confirmed' , source_database = 'Swiss-Prot' WHERE experiment_id = 2 AND protein_id = 20;
UPDATE proteomics_data SET peptide_evidence = 'New Evidence', spectral_count = 100 WHERE experiment_id = 1 AND protein_id = 3;
UPDATE proteomics_data SET spectral_count = 50, peptide_sequence = 'ACDGFTR' WHERE protein_id = 5 AND experiment_id = 2;
UPDATE Proteins SET protein_name = 'Protein A' WHERE protein_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Experiments SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', experiment_date = '2022-01-20 15:30:00' WHERE experiment_id = '567890ab-cdef-1234-5678-abcdef012345';
UPDATE Proteins SET protein_name = 'updated_protein', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE protein_id = 'd04f8b9b-aca3-492e-b7d4-6d5dd9df5d1c'
UPDATE Experiments SET researcher_name = 'John Smith', updated_at = '2022-05-21 09:00:00' WHERE experiment_id = '74a2ff8e-1964-4f8d-a2c4-64738bc3ea93'

UPDATE experimental_data SET result = 'Positive' WHERE experiment_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
UPDATE Proteins SET molecular_weight = 75.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Peptides SET peptide_sequence = 'AGTDFR' WHERE id = 3;
